title: 97/248/EC: Commission Decision of 25 March 1997 recognizing in principle the completeness of the dossier submitted for detailed examination in view of the possible inclusion of pseudomonas chlororaphis in Annex I to Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant protection products on the market (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 25 March 1997 recognizing in principle the completeness of the dossier submitted for detailed examination in view of the possible inclusion of pseudomonas chlororaphis in Annex I to Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant protection products on the market (Text with EEA relevance) (97/248/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The dossier submitted by Svenska LantmĂ¤nnen to the Commission and the Member States with a view to the inclusion of pseudomonas chlororaphis as active substance in Annex I to Directive 91/414/EEC and which was referred to the Standing Committee on Plant Health on 20 March 1996, is considered as satisfying in principle the data and information requirements provided for in Annex II and, for a plant protection product containing the active substance concerned, in Annex III to the Directive.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 March 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 230, 19. 8. 1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 277, 30. 10. 1996, p. 25.
